entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Snow level 1000 metres. Fog patches developing overnight. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 27 March 2023
